column5: Have yourselves a great day. Those of you who are participating in the Ontario Fishing Network 2008 tournament, this is the first day. Best of luck to everyone in the tournament.
Yup .... the gloves are off now for those in the tourny.  Gonna be great seeing the monsters that are caught this year.
Wouldn't ya know it they are calling for rain all weekend.
Let the tall tales begin.  Good luck to everyone.  Remember it's hard to catch a fish from your sofa.
Scott...you gotta watch your language on this board...  "WORK" is a four letter word...
